name: Merry & Bite
description:
In this Lasers and Feelings hack you are vampire, and it is the end of year holiday season! Your mission is to explore the town, the mall, the main street of your neighborhood, deal with the fact you need some last minute gifts, trinkets ,a bite to eat, and defend your loved ones, coworkers, and standard humans against their depleting holiday spirit. Your boss Eric Snipes has been overcome by a deep hunger, leaving you to fend for yourselves while your boss tries to resist their inner monster; just DAYS before the holiday no less!

Layout by Jess Meier/@burst0fhope
